validateChildConstraintsOnNonConstraintDmo

public static void validateChildConstraintsOnNonConstraintDmo(DeployModelObject parentDmo,
                                                              DeployModelObject constraintContext,
                                                              DeployModelObject reportingContext,
                                                              IDeployValidationContext context,
                                                              IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates all the immediate child constraints of the non-constraint deploy model object.

Parameters:
parentDmo - the deploy model object whose child constraints should be validated.
constraintContext - the deploy model object whose child constraints should be validated.
reportingContext -
context - the validation context.
reporter - used to report validation errors.

validateConstraintAndReport

public static void validateConstraintAndReport(Constraint constraint,
                                               DeployModelObject validationContext,
                                               DeployModelObject reportingDMO,
                                               IProgressMonitor monitor,
                                               IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates constraint in the validation context, but may use different reporting DMO. If reportingDMO is not NULL an is different from the validationContext, then each individual IDeployStatus is wrapped into a DeployWrapperStatus that has reportingDMO as a DMO on which the status is set. Reports all errors to the reporter and catches all exceptions.

Parameters:
constraint - the constraint to be validated
parentDmo - parent DMO
validationContext - the constraint validation context
reportingDMO - the target for statuses. If null, then validationContext is used.
monitor - progress monitor
reporter - used to report validation errors

getExpectedContext

public static DeployModelObject getExpectedContext(Constraint constraint)
Computes the actual (or expected) validation context for a given constraint. One use of this method is in the UI, which needs to know the validation context DMO for an Attribute Value Constraint and Requirement Expresion, to produce the list of attributes on the context DMO.

Parameters:
constraint - the constraint
Returns:
actual (or, expected) validation context DMO. Returns null, if can not figure out the validation contex DMO.

getExpectedContextDmoType

public static EClass getExpectedContextDmoType(Constraint constraint)
Computes the type of the actual (or expected) validation context for a given constraint. One use of this method is in the UI, which needs to know the validation context DMO for an Attribute Value Constraint and Requirement Expresion, to produce the list of attributes on the context DMO.

Parameters:
constraint - the constraint
Returns:
actual (or, expected) validation context DMO Type. Never returns null. If can not figure out the validation contex DMO Type, returns CorePackage.Literals#DEPLOY_MODEL_OBJECT.
